resources.name: Sunshine Care Home
resources.description: Sunshine Care Home provides residential care for elderly people in a comfortable and supportive environment. We offer 24-hour care, private rooms, and a range of activities to promote wellbeing.

resources.name: Smith & Jones Solicitors
resources.description: Specialist solicitors providing legal advice on wills, power of attorney, care funding, and inheritance planning for elderly clients and their families.

resources.name: Mobility Solutions UK
resources.description: Suppliers of a wide range of mobility aids including wheelchairs, walking frames, stair lifts, and daily living aids. We offer assessments, installations, and maintenance services.

resources.name: Meals Direct
resources.description: Hot meal delivery service for elderly and vulnerable people. We provide nutritious meals prepared by professional chefs, with special diets catered for.

resources.name: Age UK Surrey
resources.address: Rex House, William Road, Guildford, Surrey GU1 4QZ
resources.description: Local charity supporting older people throughout Surrey. Services include home help, befriending, advice on benefits and care options, and social activities.

resources.name: Silver Cinema Club
resources.address: Cinema House, 24 Screen Street, Nottingham NG1 3AL
resources.description: Special cinema screenings for over-65s with discounted tickets, accessible facilities, and classic film showings. Tea and coffee included.

resources.name: Elderly Care Clinic
resources.description: Specialized healthcare service for older people. Our team includes geriatricians, specialist nurses, and therapists providing comprehensive care for age-related conditions.
